title: S5 Ep38: Divest or engage?
itunes:title: Divest or engage?
description: When pension giant ABP faced protests about its fossil fuel investment strategy, did it choose to exert pressure on oil companies or divest from them? Jeff Wurgler and Dirk Schoenmaker talk to Tim Phillips about how the finance sector can accelerate a green transition.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
